trivia_items.text: His title, foedere, is the ablative singular of foedus, meaning "covenant" in Latin.

Instead of using scythe like the other members of Reaper class branch, Executor the Ex Foedere wields dual shotguns. The scythes however are still present in his Elite 2 artwork. In his sprite, the scythe is wielded by a flying drone that hovers around him.

He is the 77th 6â˜… Operator to be released which coincides with his birthday July 7th, and his combat experience is listed 7 years. His maximum base ATK amount with 200% Trust is even 777. See Executor/Trivia for more info.
sub_items: To make this even funnier, his alter's Paradox Simulation enemy count is exactly 77. In his alter's Operator Record, it is even revealed that he has the same exact 7 work outfits.

trivia_items.text: Executor's profile was revealed in his Weibo's introduction lines as follows:
